triageapp.database

Class DBAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • triageapp.database.DBAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TriageDBAdapter

    public class DBAdapter
extends Object
    Triage database helper class. Has the ability to create the DB, open a connection to the DB, and close the connection, and well as check if a connection is open or not.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  DBAdapter.DatabaseHelper
      A helper class to manage database creation and version management.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBAdapter

        public DBAdapter(Context ctx)
        Constructs a DBAdapter object and takes the context to allow the database to be opened/created.
        Parameters:
        ctx - The Context within which to work.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public DBAdapter open()
               throws SQLException
        Open the Triage+ app database. If it cannot be opened, try to create a new instance of the database. If it cannot be created, throw an exception to signal the failure.
        Returns:
        this (self reference, allowing this to be chained in an initialization call)
        Throws:
        SQLException - if the database could be neither opened or created

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        Checks if the database is currently open.
        Returns:
        true if a connection the database has been opened.

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the connection the the database.
